data.text:
published on 2017-12-07T12:13:58Z

Ferdinand Philippe d'Orleans and the cholera On 1 April 1832, Prince Royal Ferdinand Philippe d'Orleans visited the cholera patients at the hospital of the HÃ´tel de Dieu, accompanied by the president of the council Casimir Pierre Perier. Both men showed great courage in order to demonstrate the closing of ranks between two leading institutions of the French state, the monarchy and its government, during this existential crisis - but only one of them would survive the daring mission...
